`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(r.p,{children:`In 2017, a group of students from Novosibirsk State Technical University teamed up to participate in an online hackathon.
The hackathon was dedicated entertainment and fun. We created an application (web and Android) with an endless battle of memes. Every few seconds, users saw a pair of memes and voted for one of them.
Players who rated the meme with a majority vote received the internal currency \u2013 MemeCoin.
We won that hackathon and received investments for development.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/home/maksim/Programming/Open_source/monorepo/apps/blog/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-516ccae6-86ce-4c48-bbed-7ceeb56edbf9.mdx",lineNumber:12,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(r.p,{children:`After that, we participated in hackathons for several years. Local hackathons in Siberia (Tomsk, Kemerovo, Novosibirsk) and large ones in Moscow. It was our hobby.
Meanwhile, we periodically returned to the original idea, but never created a real product \u{1F622}`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/home/maksim/Programming/Open_source/monorepo/apps/blog/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-516ccae6-86ce-4c48-bbed-7ceeb56edbf9.mdx",lineNumber:23,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(r.p,{children:"In parallel with hackathons, we have done some educational projects. For example, in union with other students, owe organized the AVTF IT community \u2013 several meetups by different streams (web development, mobile development, databases, information security, data science). For you to know, our first meetup brought together more than 150 people!"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/home/maksim/Programming/Open_source/monorepo/apps/blog/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-516ccae6-86ce-4c48-bbed-7ceeb56edbf9.mdx",lineNumber:28,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(r.p,{children:'We often discussed MemeBattle and told our friends about it. But we have not been able to answer the question "What is MemeBattle". We usually answer like this:'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/home/maksim/Programming/Open_source/monorepo/apps/blog/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-516ccae6-86ce-4c48-bbed-7ceeb56edbf9.mdx",lineNumber:32,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(r.p,{children:"MemeBattle is not a dot on a map. MemeBattle is people."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/home/maksim/Programming/Open_source/monorepo/apps/blog/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-516ccae6-86ce-4c48-bbed-7ceeb56edbf9.mdx",lineNumber:33,columnNumber:3},this),`
